snippet: The Army on Thursday suspended the head of its Western Regional Medical Command, which is in charge of Army hospitals in 20 Western states.
abstract: United States Army suspends Brig Gen John M Cho, in charge of 20 Army hospitals as head of Western Regional Medical Command, pending outcome of 'inquiry centered on the command climate of the organization.'
lead_paragraph: The Army on Thursday suspended the head of its Western Regional Medical Command, which is in charge of Army hospitals in 20 Western states.

headline.main: Washington: Army Suspends a Medical Chief
headline.print_headline: Washington: Army Suspends a Medical Chief
